titleStmt.title: Letter from Mary B. Thompson to John G. Neihardt, April 29, 1971
titleStmt.author: Thompson, Mary B.

publicationStmt.authority: The Papers of John G. Neihardt

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: Letter from Mary B. Thompson to John G. Neihardt, April 29, 1971

msIdentifier.repository: John G. Neihardt Center Research Library, Aly Collection

div1.fw:
ISAAC E. LEWIS PRINCIPAL CHARITY RATCLIFF, SECRETARY
JACK LIVINGSTON, VICE PRINCIPAL JUANITA STANLEY, CLERK-TREASURER
SMB BEA - RIGHTS ever sold on this title?
Please return SMB
Cascade High School (HENDRICKS COUNTY) P.O. BOX H CLAYTON, INDIANA 46118 539-6545

address.addrLine: Lothrop, Lee, and Stewart Company, Inc.

div1.p: On the Dick Cavett show Tuesday night, April27 Dr Neihardt appeared and told of his book written many eyars ago entitled Black Elk Speaks. I have hunted for this title and finally found it in Standard Catalog published by Wilson - th 1947 volume. The reference there was to a short story in a volume by Amy Hogeboam entitled Boy's book of the "est published in 1946 by your compay/ -s this publication available or do you have another title that contains this story? Our eighth grade students have become interested in any Indian story that deals with the early west as well as those of a more recent period.
I am enclosing a self addressed envelope.

closer.note: Mrs Mary B. Thompson, Librarian Cascade High School Box H Clayton, Indiana 46118
